attacks.name: Cheer Up
attacks.effect: Attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dump Truck Press
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Megaton Friends GX
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), draw cards until you have 10 cards in your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
